text: Tomara ai mahilara mata hayo na, ye parisramera para kata suta tukaro tukaro kare chire phele, tomara nijedera kasamasamuhake parasparika prabancanara bahana rupe grahana kara ejan'ye ye, an'ya dala apeksa eka dala adhika ksamatabana haye yaya. Etadbara to allaha sudhu tomadera pariksa karena. Allaha abasya'i kiyamatera dina prakasa kare debena, ye bisaye tomara kalaha karate.
